text: Universal healthcare in Lebanon under threat due to privatization attempts! 🚨💔 Social security contributions and national institution budgets have lost value, while draft bills for universal coverage have been ignored. 🙅‍♂️👀 Political parties are pushing for private initiatives, jeopardizing the role of the NSSF as main insurer for private sector workers. 💪🏻 We must protect and strengthen social security institutions to achieve true universal healthcare! 💕🌎
